info.readme:
A simple contact form, written in Razor. The Razor file is structured so that you can easily modify the existing fields or add new ones.
Basic usage:
To put the contact form on your template, add this Umbraco macro: <umbraco:Macro FileLocation="~/macroScripts/CultivContactForm.cshtml" MailFrom="hi@test.com" runat="server" />
This is the simplest way to start and add the form to your site. It will give you a full contact form with validation. The MailFrom parameter is required, this is the e-mail address that will appear in the “from” field of the e-mails that are being sent out. Additionally, you may add a parameter called MailFromName to specify the name that will be shown in the “from” field.
There are many configurable elements for this package, for full documentation go to the Cultiv Razor Contact Form package page on our.umbraco.org and click on the "documentation" tab. The URL: http://our.umbraco.org/projects/website-utilities/cultiv-razor-contact-form
